actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to eliminate the low-income farm ownership loan program. Establishes FY 1983 through 1985 lending limits under the Agricultural Credit Insurance Fund for real estate loans, farm ownership loans, water development and conservation loans, operating loans, and emergency loans. Allocates specified amounts for insured and guaranteed loans (but not for emergency loans). Authorizes fund transfers. Establishes FY 1983 through 1985 lending limits under the Rural Development Insurance Fund for water and waste disposal loans and for community facility loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
